content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

This part of the groove is at a corner. The stiffness should be low in all directions to prevent damage.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
